name: Space Hamsters Demo - WebGL
description:
A WebGL version of Space Hamsters to be played within the chosen browser.

This is a small demo of a game I am currently working on.  The game might be prone to a few bugs, here and there but shouldn't have game breaking bugs.

You play as a hamster ball (soon to feature a hamster) and must track down all food scattered around a space station. Use the breakable and moveable objects to your advantage to reach high up areas or to cause destruction.

Speed-running the demo earns a small reward. Feel free to find out what that is!
